thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: U.S. Government Bonds Decline as Inflation Data Looms

author: Daniel Kruger
title: U.S. Government Bonds Decline as Inflation Data Looms

organizations.name: u.s. government bonds decline as inflation data looms

text:
U.S. government bonds weakened Monday, with investors becoming increasingly attuned to the risk that inflation is preparing to stage a comeback.
The benchmark Treasury 10-year note yield rose to 2.487%, according to Tradeweb, up from 2.476% Friday. Yields rise as bond prices fall.
With this weekâ€™s calender light on economic data, some investors...
